title: spaskirostum
author: spaskirostum
content: Good day everyone !Want to Buy BTC : direct miner / wallet holder needed. We are available on Telegram to explain our requirements in detail ( contact me for Telegram username )

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: Please provide your telegram account as your account is set to not receive DMs from "Newbie" account ratings. We have a mining farm and we can sell you BTC you need.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: spaskirostum on May 29, 2022, 12:27:00 PMWe are available on Telegram to explain our requirements in detail ( contact me for Telegram username )What are those requirements that are so hard to explain here?Â  Trying to look for a victim, you can easily trick and scam via telegram?In this forum, transparency is a norm, especially when one is trying to list a currency exchange deal. It's why this board is there in the first place

comments.author: zbutterfly
comments.body: Quote from: spaskirostum on May 29, 2022, 12:27:00 PMWe are available on Telegram to explain our requirements in detail ( contact me for Telegram username )at least you have a website, and a third party for asset exchange services. if you make a thread like this, please complete your services first.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: There was no reason to reply to this old thread in the first place, the OP contacted me on Telegram and never replied after, just another waste of time.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on August 17, 2022, 09:23:46 AMThere was no reason to reply to this old thread in the first place, the OP contacted me on Telegram and never replied after, just another waste of time.And you did bother reporting back what happened back then? What happened to community spirit?A clueless new member was asking for the scammer's username. Your warning would have come in handy had he seen your feedback.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on August 19, 2022, 11:39:04 PMQuote from: alterra57 on August 17, 2022, 09:23:46 AMThere was no reason to reply to this old thread in the first place, the OP contacted me on Telegram and never replied after, just another waste of time.And you did bother reporting back what happened back then? What happened to community spirit?A clueless new member was asking for the scammer's username. Your warning would have come in handy had he seen your feedback.I didn't think much of it, there's plenty of people like OP, I can't filter through all of them.
